name: TypeRocket UI
author: TypeRocket

sections.description:
Add custom post types and taxonomies to your website without code. With the TypeRocket UI plugin, you can register advanced post types and advanced taxonomies without knowing any code. Plus, TypeRocket UI goes beyond what you expect from a typical post type registration plugin by providing advanced features like:

  1. Post type placeholder text control.
  2. Post type revision control.
  3. Custom field column control for a post type’s table view.
  4. Remove the slug prefix from your post type.
  5. Gutenberg controls.
  6. And much more.

For over 12 years, TypeRocket has helped thousands of developers and designers craft powerful WordPress websites. With TypeRocket UI, you get many of the powerful features the TypeRocket developers have come to know and trust in a graphical interface.
sections.installation: Upload the typerocket-ui plugin to your blog. Activate it! Then Go to TypeRocket UI in the main admin menu and start registering your post types.
sections.changelog:
5.0.11

  • Add WordPress 6.1.9 support.
  • Improve code.
  • Fix bugs.

5.0.10

  • Add WordPress 6.0.1 support.
  • Improve code.
  • Fix bugs.

5.0.9

  • Add WordPress 6.0 support.
  • Improve code.
  • Fix bugs.

5.0.8

  • Add WordPress 5.9 support.
  • Improve code.
  • Fix bugs.

5.0.7

  • Add WordPress 5.8 support.
  • Improve code.
  • Fix bugs.

5.0.6

  • Add WordPress 5.7 support.
  • Improve code.
  • Fix bugs.

5.0.5

  • Add WordPress 5.6 support.

5.0.4

  • Add open and pro compatibility.

5.0.3

  • Add help text.

5.0.2

  • Fix deploy script.

5.0.1

  • Require plural names.
  • Allow overriding of existing post types like post and page.
  • Bug fixes.

5.0.0

  • Custom Post Type, Taxonomies, and Meta Box UI

short_description: This plugin provides a powerful user interface for creating post types, taxonomies, and meta boxes.
